title: Ferguson police investigating fatal shooting of teenage boy
content:
FERGUSON • Police are investigating the fatal shooting of a teenager that happened just after midnight Sunday on the 100 block of Elkan Avenue.
Police say the victim and shooter knew each other and believe the shooting was the result of an ongoing dispute, city spokesman Jeff Small said. The shooting is under investigation, but no arrests have been made.
Authorities did not release further details.
Officials ask anyone with information about the incident to contact the Ferguson Police Department at 314-522-3100.
